title: Shadowed Ascension
description: The third and final installment of the Shadowed Series by Wendi L. WilsonAfter one terrible night, Melanie Johnsonâ€™s life is unrecognizable. Things have gone from bad to worse after one split-second decision changed the path of not only her future, but the futures of those closest to her. Just as she, Jeremy and the rest of her friends and family start to come to grips with the repercussions of that night, two of their own go missing. Kidnapped by a mysterious stranger determined to ascend to the position of power, they must survive as Melanie and her loved ones fight to find and rescue them. As the clock ticks down, hard choices are made, mistakes are inevitable and Melanie learns that true love really does conquer all.
author: Wendi L. Wilson
